description: A report recommending a "cost neutral" shake-up of pay for Isle of Man politicians splits opinion.
title: Isle of Man politicians shelve vote on Tynwald pay shake-up
title_page: Isle of Man politicians shelve vote on Tynwald pay shake-up - BBC News
maintext: However, the movement of a payment for expenses into taxable pay - a sum which was previously tax-free - and changes to pension arrangements meant MHKs would not be better off overall under the new arrangements.
